actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-706.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 342 - 8 (Record Vote No: 340).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5543) to establish an Ocean and Coastal Resources Management and Development Fund and to require the Secretary of Commerce to provide to coastal States national ocean and resources management and development block grants from sums in the Fund.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 5543 (Ocean and Coastal Resources Management and Development Fund).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 5543) to establish an Ocean and Coastal Resources Management and Development Fund and to require the Secretary of Commerce to provide to coastal States national ocean and resources management and development block grants from sums in the Fund.
